description: NP4 files replaced .NPT files, which are used by older versions of NetPoint (versions 1-3). You can only open NP4 files with NetPoint version 4 and later, they cannot be opened by NetPoint version 3 or earlier.

NetPoint is used for a variety of schedules and projects, such as a construction of a building, a development of a website, or events during a wedding day. You can analyze work tasks, schedule dates, organize activities, and layout yearlong plans.
